scenes.background: You are on annual leave, enjoying some well-deserved time off to recharge. However, during your time away, a colleague messages you privately, saying thereâ€™s an urgent task that needs immediate attention. The request creates a dilemma as you try to balance respecting your time off while feeling the pressure to help with the urgent task. You chose to take a quick look and help out. After some time, [Monica] and [Bob] approach you in the cafeteria. [Monica] looks slightly concerned while [Bob] seems indifferent. You expressed understanding of Monica's concerns and acknowledged you should have set clearer boundaries. [Bob] then chimed in, and you emphasized the need for balance.
scenes.description: [Monica] sighs and says, 'I get that we need to help out, but it's frustrating when people don't respect our time off. What do you think, [Alex]?'

options.text: It's a tricky situation, Monica. We need to find a way to make it work for everyone.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the complexity of the situation, showing good emotional perception and empathy while maintaining a balanced approach.

options.text: Maybe we should discuss this with the team and set some ground rules.
options.analysis: You suggest a proactive solution, demonstrating good self-regulation and social skills while considering the team's needs.

options.text: Honestly, if people can't respect our time off, maybe we need to rethink our priorities.
options.analysis: You take a more assertive stance, showing strong motivation but lower empathy and social skills.
